title: further, additional 20% incentive on free sale component shall be permissible and if such density is more than 850 T/Ha
clause_text: further, additional 20% incentive on free sale component shall be permissible and if such density is more than 850 T/Ha., additional 30% incentive on free sale component shall be permissible.
